content: Does anybody know how clippy interacts with incr. comp.? I noticed that cargo clippy will generate files in target/debug/incremental but I can't find any place where clippy args are tracked by the incremental system. There's track_clippy_args but that does not seem to be covered by the commandline hash.
honestly I would be surprised if anyone did :sweat_smile:
Well, I think it should not be too hard to make it work properly. It just needs an audit.
